title: 纯音乐分享第三期——I Love You、Yeah、Hello
author: HOW浩
txt_content:
大家好~今天来继续分享纯音乐——OMFG的I Love You、Yeah和Hello——
http://www.xiami.com/widget/0_1774011324/singlePlayer.swfhttp://www.xiami.com/widget/0_1774336204/singlePlayer.swfhttp://www.xiami.com/widget/0_1773752169/singlePlayer.swf
